strapiPost.title: Competing at D1 Level
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas is growing with spaces for athletes and professional sports training.

  • Staying strong: Two D1 Training facilities are coming to Bentonville and Fayetteville, making them the 4th and 5th locations in Arkansas. Both locations are slated to open within the next 18 months.
  • Fitness: D1 Training is a national franchise with over 50 locations all offering scholastic, adult, and professional training.

Read more HERE.
